com.openxc.measurements
Interface MeasurementInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
VehicleMeasurement
All Known Implementing Classes:
BrakePedalStatus, EngineSpeed, Latitude, Longitude, Measurement, SteeringWheelAngle, TransmissionGearPosition, VehicleButtonEvent, VehicleSpeed, WindshieldWiperSpeed
public interface MeasurementInterface

The MeasurementInterface is the base for all OpenXC measurements. A Measurement has at least a value and an age, and optionally a range of valid values. It is not required to have a value - users of this class must either catch the NoValueException returned by getValue() or check for validity first with isNone().

Method Summary

          Retreive the age of this measurement.

          Retrieve the valid range of the measurement.

          Return the value of this measurement.

          Determine if this measurement has a valid range.
 boolean isNone()
          Check the validity of this measurement.

Returns:

boolean hasRange()
Determine if this measurement has a valid range.

Returns:
true if the measurement has a non-null range.

                               throws NoRangeException

Returns:

Throws:

              throws NoValueException
Return the value of this measurement.

Returns:
